Text: How do you make these games work on your Gizmondo?
Someone actually owns a Gizmondo? After that company went belly up due to their ties to the swedish mafia, I didn't think any more of them existed. They're like the Delorean of the videogame world.
Gizmondos where sold really cheap in sweden after the company went down. But there's not so many gizmondos, that's correct. But who cares? Isn't such a super-cheap console worth some games? xD
